basics.name: Alex Milkov
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Past experience resides in distributed systems and programming language theory but also interested in AI/ML, security, and crypto to name a few

highlights: Catalog Items Server team - Responsible for developing and maintaining the items service (Go) which manages merchant catalogs. Internal clients are Square POS and Dashboard served via gRPC while 3rd parties like UberEats and Postmates are served via Connect V2, a REST API. Datastore is manually sharded (on merchant) MySQL. Search is back by Elasticsearch

Introduced Rust to Square by porting internal libraries necessary to run a service in Square's environments. A few of these components: RPC + HTTP server framework, clients (RPC, HTTP, Slack, Pagerduty, etc), protobuf compiler, admin console, MySQL + Redis client, configs/env vars/other scaffolding, logging, metrics, Envoy, builds, feeds, jobs
Lots of design docs, PR reviews, interviews, documentation
